The International School of Moscow Part of The British Schools Group
Dear Parents,
Like every Thursday, please find some interesting info below.
Welcome Coffee Mornings
Thanks to all parents that attended our Lower Primary Coffee Morning this week. Please be aware of the following dates that offer an opportunity to meet new parents joining our school.
Upper Campus (Y4- Y10) Wednesday January 30th 8:30- 9:30 in UC Canteen
Foundation Stage (Nursery and Reception) Thursday January 31st 8:30- 9:30 in LC Canteen
ICT developments for 2013
As I think we all appreciate, mobile technology will increasing figure prominently in our daily lives professionally and personally. At school we recognize the possibilities that technology offers but at the same time believe in striking a balance between innovative and traditional learning.
As you will be aware our present Year 10 students enjoy the use of a personal notebook, provided by the school to support their studies. This initiative will be repeated for our next Year 10 group of students.
In addition, we will also provide individual IPADs for all students in Key Stage Three for next year (Year 7-9).
We plan to introduce this mobile technology from Term 3 this year to the appropriate year groups:
Present Year 9: Notebooks
Present Year 6- 8 IPADs.
We will of course keep you fully informed regarding this development.
In addition we will also enhance the number of IPADS available to both Primary and Foundation Stage students for next year to support learning in targeted lessons.
Best regards,
The International School of Moscow World Class Education
